title: Azir Ult Bug?

embed.description: I got stuck inside of azirs wall Watch live at http://www.twitch.tv/enclimits

body: I got stuck inside of the {{champion:268}} wall, isnt it supposed to make you bounce?

replies.body: That was no bug :P. You were creepblocked by enemy creeps. As the rioter said, well played azir.
Those minions were creepblocking you... well played Azir.
shouldnt that still not happen? this seems like it could be abused to cc lock someone and kill them.
Not really making the connection here for why awesome plays like this should not happen. You can do exactly the same thing with Anivia's wall or Trundle's pillar.
It wasnt really an awesome play it was a bug, not to mention its unfair. there is no counterplay to being cclocked for the whole ult.
Riven could have just killed the minion with a single autoattack....
she would have to kill at least 2 most likely, and thats not a good attitude to have around balancing/glitches. if azir had items shed be dead.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=wd1TlMNm,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-06T07:52:51.097+0000)
>
> Riven could have just killed the minion with a single autoattack....

Because in that situation you can totally realise that the problem is creep-blocking, figure out which minion(s) is/are causing the problem and auto attack them? People don't play the game expecting to find ridiculous stuff like this - there's a reason the person who uploaded the video thought it was a bug.

I'm not sure how serious you're being but if this isn't a joke, "It's Riven's fault" is absolutely ridiculous. You can't be expected to figure out 1-in-10000-games situations like this in a split second, especially when they look as buggy as this. 90% of people would just assume their game is glitching out or something.

Minions always creep block. Why do you think {{summoner:6}} and several skills have "ignore unit collisions" on them? It's not for the rare time when you're unable to move because of a minion wall.
The difference is if you're partially creep blocked, or fully creep blocked. Full creep block is rare, but it happens. Partial creep block happens every time you have to move slightly though/around any other unit, you'll always get bumped off it/it will bump off you (unless you have the 'ignore unit collision' effect on at the time).

The Riven should learn to attack-move or a-click. That in itself would fix the problem without even having to think about it.
What is Riot's position on CB, now that you've acknowledged this post

This exact bug happened to me some times ago as Taric, he ulted me in the red side red, i bounced on a wall and got stuck in the middle of his wall, could not use flash or other spells but only Targon active. I don't record games sorry. Just to let you know it is not an impossible bug.
So if i get to do master doing this i wont get like banned or anything? lol

Trap people between Walls and Azir's ult. It's basically the same effect.
If it's a banable offense, I;m in trouble. (>_>)

So you are talking about this bug on azir, for his wall but you wouldn't talk about the bug he has on the W-E-Q where he stands still for 3 seconds straight unable to do anything as if in a Morgana Q which happens in like 30% of all your combos in one game?!
That wasn't a bug, that was some next level Azir plays right there, combining his wall with creep block on his allied creeps.

I don't think it's really a bug, it has been possible for as long as he's been out.  I remember the first time I saw someone get caught between an Azir ult and a wall.  He couldn't even flash out from it.  It's really annoying for the person on the receiving end of it, but it is intended.
